pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Trait Analysis of Rare-Variant Association Study // Perform multi-trait rare-variant association tests using the summary statistics and adjust for possible sample overlap. Package is based on "Multi-Trait Analysis of Rare-Variant Association Summary Statistics using MTAR" by Luo, L., Shen, J., Zhang, H., Chhibber, A. Mehrotra, D.V., Tang, Z., 2019 (submitted).
